mapper.select: select naire.title as title, naire.id as id, naire.status_id as statusId, naire.active_date_start as activeDateStart, naire.active_date_end as activeDateEnd, naire.creation_timestamp as creationTimestamp, naire.creation_user as creationUser, naire.lastupdate_timestamp as lastupdateTimestamp, naire.lastupdate_user as lastupdateUser from questionaire_t naire where naire.id=#{id} and use_yn != 'n'
